item.title: Topic 1: The Problem of Justice
item.description: Are there any reasons not to behave unjustly, if we can get away with it? We observe Plato asking this question throgh a “thought experiment.” Reading Plato, “The Ring of Gyges,” an excerpt from his longer work Republic. See also First
